_comments: # Propagate a new, 'Survivor' Trait species based on the existing pre-FTL one

else.log_error: No species found for \\[This.Species.GetName] pop owned by \\[This.Owner.GetName] on \\[This.Planet.GetName] to assimilate to

limit.exists: event_target:crisis_country #i.e. not final destruction of all matter

add_tech_progress.tech: $TECH$ #the formula basically means min( 1, <calced value> ), it's needed because trying to grant more than 1 causes error messages

_comments: # community opens internal borders and ceases pre-existing wars with the Crisis
#First we need to get the variables that determine how big the boon is
# Formula is ( initiates * random factor ) / (total pops), and then round that to the nearest 0.1 to avoid weird-looking results
#This is effectively ( base * random ), where base = 30
#It is balanced so that sacrificing 5% of your pops gives a really good result
# We do some maths here to calculate the effective percentage of your population sacrificed
# and cap the bonus to 15% as if you'd sacrificed 15% of your population if it is greater.
#We also need the edicts length multiplier for the modifiers
# Scale result by the level of any death_cult councilor.

limit.set_planet_flag: being_killed #probably only removed in the next tick

limit.log: AI [This.GetName] defaulted as a result of [Root.GetName] in [GetYear]

else.log: Player [This.GetName] defaulted as a result of [Root.GetName] in [GetYear]

# makes system positions originate from galactic core
# makes system positions originate from galactic core

owner.has_country_flag: market_nomination_eligible # i.e. they are or were a GalCom member
